data.name: Femboys & Fries
data.detailed_description:
A sexy new joint has just opened up in town and you decide to check it out on payday.

Upon arrival you're likely to suspect that you've died and gone to heaven.
The fries are hot and the femboys are sizzling. This will be an experience that your not soon to forget!

Order of the menu and don't forget to tip your waiter.

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

A few choices will influence the sexual acts that proceed

H-Scenes
~9K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
*All characters in this game are over the age of 21 years old.

- Femboy
- Male on male sex
- Dirty language
